page.title: 10EVENING ACTIVITIES
page.content:
{ Evening meals:}Most people eat meat and vegetables. 8 people eat Indian food. For 3 people it varies. One person eats vegetarian food. 1 person eats chips and 1 person eats sandwiches.
The most popular activities in the evening are watching television. Some people do sports like badminton, fishing, football or darts. Other things include evening classes, discos, drama or watching videos. Some people work, some people look after children and others play records. Other activities are cleaning the house, playing outside, reading or preparing school work.
